name: Mage, Mage, And More Mage
description:
CONTROLS :

W , A , S , D = Move

1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 = Change Element

Elements Attacks :

Normal = 10 Damage

Fire = 4 Damage

Water = 3 Damage

Earth = 30 Damage

Wind = 6 Damage

Enemy Stats :

Wisp = has 35 HP, and deal 15 Damage

MageWisp = has 30 HP, and deal 10 Damage

GiantWisp = has 1000 HP, and deal 20 Damage 

 Created by me :  @GreenVeee

Musics & SFX by : 

★ @VetNovice

★ @FOREVERSPENCER
